name: Gladiator Beast Sagittarii
text: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster: You can discard 1 "Gladiator Beast" card; draw 2 cards. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Sagittarii".
